Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I have the problem. Quest is to build orbital station for 19 kerbals then place it on solar orbit (at stable orbit station should have 6000 fuel) and one more condition "Place 3 kerbals with tourist prof. on the station"

First I make station with 20 seats take additional contract with 5 tourists place 3 of them on station and launch it to solar orbit...

Does not work

Then I make 1 station with 6 seats place on it 5 tourists launch it to solar orbit then build another station with 20 seats and launch it to solar orbit then docked one to another and place 3 tourists from first station to another...

 

Does not work...

 

Any advice ?
There should be a list of mission criteria that tells you which parts are completed and which are not.  What is showing as "not completed?"
Which version of the game are you playing?

14 hours ago, UniDay said:

station should have 6000 fuel

Check if you have enough liquid fuel on board. Many of the contracts specify which type of fuel you must have. If it requires 6000 liquid fuel then you must have that much remaining when the other requirements are met, and it does not count the oxidizer towards your goal.

Only fuel (without oxidizer) 9000+ on the first station and 9200+ on the second

over 18000 when stations are docked...

I'm already done several contracts with orbital station (even solar orbit)

But this is the first one with term (Place kerbal with tourist prof)

Saves are included if some one interested.

13 hours ago, bewing said:

Which version of the game are you playing?

1.4.1.2089 (MAC OS)

15 hours ago, Kurld said:

There should be a list of mission criteria that tells you which parts are completed and which are not.  What is showing as "not completed?"

Place 3 tourist on the station

Every body thanks problem solved.

This is the bug... I've changed translation of the game to English for making screen shot of conditions and all conditions match solved.
